text: Find the odd one out: Dog, Cat, Cow, Table
If BOOK is coded as CPPL, how is WORD coded?
All roses are flowers. Some flowers are red. Therefore:
A is B's sister. B is C's mother. D is C's father. How is A related to D?
In a certain code, RAIN is written as 8$%6 and MORE is written as 7#8@. How is ROME written?
If South-East becomes North, North-East becomes West and so on, what will West become?
A clock shows 3:15. What is the angle between the hour and minute hands?
In a row of students, John is 7th from the left and 12th from the right. How many students are in the row?
If the day before yesterday was Thursday, what will be the day after tomorrow?
